mapper.select: select sc.component_name, m.x, m.y from vis_monitoring m left join vis_specific_component sc on m.sensor_id = sc.id where sc.model_code = #{sensorModelCode}
select s.online as onlineName, count(s.id) as onlineNum from vis_sensor s where s.is_deleted = 0 group by s.online
select c.name as sensorType, count(sc.id) as sensorNum from vis_specific_component sc left join vis_component c on sc.component_id = c.id where sc.is_deleted = 0 and sc.is_sensor = 1 group by c.name
select s.alarm as sensorAlarm, count(s.id) as sensorAlarmNum from vis_sensor s where s.is_deleted = 0 group by s.alarm
